1057.issue: [E1057] js-controller 5.0.0 listed as dependency but 5.0.19 is required as minimum, 6.0.11 is recommended. Please update dependency at [io-package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.beckhoff/blob/master/io-package.json).

1078.issue: [W1078] "common.materialize" is deprecated for admin >= 5 at [io-package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.beckhoff/blob/master/io-package.json). Please use property "common.adminUI.config".

1084.issue: [W1084] "common.main" is deprecated and ignored. Please remove from [io-package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.beckhoff/blob/master/io-package.json). Executable is defined by entry "main" at [package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.beckhoff/blob/master/package.json).

4041.issue: [E4041] Incorrect schema URL for "io-package.json" in .vscode/settings.json. Expected: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.js-controller/master/schemas/io-package.json", found: "https://json.schemastore.org/io-package"

5022.issue: [S5022] Please consider migrating to admin 5 UI (jsonConfig) or react based UI.

6009.issue: [W6009] Multiple copyright lines found in [README.md](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.beckhoff/blob/master/README.md) but line(s) 1 missing trailing spaces. Add two spaces at end of each copyright line (except last) for proper formatting.

7003.issue: [W7003] Multiple copyright lines found in LICENSE but line(s) 1 missing trailing spaces. Add two spaces at end of each copyright line (except last) for proper formatting.

8004.issue: [W8004] Please process issue [[#231] "Migration to ESLint 9 and @iobroker/eslint-config"](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.beckhoff/issues/231)

9006.issue: [S9006] .commitinfo file should be excluded by .gitignore, please add a line with text ".commitinfo" to .gitignore

0028.issue: [W0028] Minimum node.js version 20 recommended. Please adapt "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '18' } }" to "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '20' } }" at [package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.beckhoff/blob/master/package.json).

0037.issue: [W0037] @alcalzone/release-script-plugin-manual-review 3.7.0 specified. 4.0.0 (or newer) is current. Please update devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.beckhoff/blob/master/package.json)

0063.issue: [W0063] "@types/sinon-chai, sinon-chai" are included in "@iobroker/testing". Remove from devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/iobroker-community-adapters/ioBroker.beckhoff/blob/master/package.json)
